text:
Chapter "Installing Ant"
Section "Getting Ant"
Subsection "Binary Edition"
contains a link to Ant’s home page.
That link opens in the frame of the manual.
Since you can navigate the manual from the main page, 
it is possible to nest the manual arbitrary number of times.
The link should replace the top frame instead.
creator: krixel@wp.pl
jkf@apache.org
text: Thanks, manual updated, should be in next release
